document.docAuthor: Knutson, Lloyd V., Deeming, John C. & Ebejer, Martin J.
document.masterDocTitle: The Snail-killing Flies (Diptera: Sciomyzidae) of West Africa

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The Snail-killing Flies (Diptera: Sciomyzidae) of West Africa

subSubSection.paragraph:
References to figures: Verbeke 1950 (as
S. testacea Loew
: aedeagus, surstylus).

Holotype ♂ ,
DEMOCRATIC REPUBLIC OF CONGO
, P.N.U., Gorges de la Pelenge, 1150m , 19.vi.1947 , Mission G.F. de Witte ( MRAC ). Not seen in IRSNB or MRAC by Knutson in 1978.

Verbeke (1950 : 57, 1961: 18) misidentified this species as
S. testacea Loew
, and (1963: 57) corrected the misidentification and named the species by back reference to Verbeke (1950) . He stated (1950) that the “forceps” and aedeagus approach the type of
S. trichrooscelis Speiser
and that other characters are as in his
S. convergens
group (his
S. convergens Loew
of 1950 and 1961 =
S. testacea Loew
, the true
S. convergens
being in the subgenus
Mesosepedon Verbeke, 1950
.

WEST
AFRICA : NIGERIA
